Footer.site_description: This website was created to deeply study Islamic sciences, avoid going astray, and provide correct answers to the questions of our fellow countrymen.

AskForm.question: Question
AskForm.submit-error: An error occurred while submitting the question. Please try again.

rules.1: Make sure your question has not been answered before! First, try to find the answer in reputable religious literature. If you can’t find it, use the 'search service.' Repeated questions will not be answered.
rules.2: Choose the right topic for your question. Identify which topic your question belongs to and post it in the appropriate section. Questions placed in the wrong section will not be published.
rules.3: Ask your question in a proper form. Think through your question before writing. Try to avoid spelling mistakes. Do not ask meaningless or illogical questions.
rules.4: Ask a clear question. It should be short and precise. Avoid long greetings and thanks. This will save your and others' time.
rules.5: Ask only one question at a time. If you have multiple questions, create a separate topic for each. Questions with multiple points will not be answered.
rules.6: Be satisfied with the answer. Do not demand evidence or references. Questions that incite disputes or disagreements are not accepted.
rules.7: Questions on the following topics will not be answered:

subrules.1: Questions about the personal life of the administrators of the 'Zikr Ahlidan So‘rang' website that do not benefit or harm your worldly or eternal life. (For example: How many hadiths do you know? Can I know who you are? etc.)
subrules.2: Dream interpretations. (For example: What does it mean if I see a fish in my dream?)
subrules.3: General topic questions. (For example: What does Islam say about the banking system?)
subrules.4: Asking why a question was not answered.
subrules.5: Questions like: 'What do you say about such-and-such scholar’s words?' or 'What do you think about such-and-such imam?'

AskForm.error_short_question: The question is too short (minimum 40 characters required)
